statements: UPDATE energy_consumption SET consumed_energy = 50.25 WHERE product_name = 'Light Bulb';
UPDATE energy_consumption SET location = 'Office' WHERE id = 10;
UPDATE energy_consumption SET consumed_energy = 100.5, location = 'New York' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE energy_consumption SET date_consumed = '2022-10-15', product_name = 'Solar Panels', consumed_energy = 75.3 WHERE location = 'California';
UPDATE energy_consumption SET consumption = 150 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE optimization_efforts SET efficiency = 0.85, impact = 0.75 WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE energy_consumption SET consumption = 200 WHERE location = 'New York' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
UPDATE optimization_efforts SET efficiency = 0.85, impact = 0.75 WHERE timestamp < '2022-03-01' AND action = 'Update Software'
UPDATE EnergyConsumption SET energy_consumed = 1500.75 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE SupplyChainOptimization SET cost_saved = 5000.25, optimized_route = 'Route A' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE EnergyConsumption SET energy_consumed = 1500.75, timestamp = NOW() WHERE id = 1
UPDATE SupplyChainOptimization SET cost_saved = 1200.50, optimization_id = 1001 WHERE target_location = 'Warehouse A'
UPDATE energy_consumption SET consumption = 500.25 WHERE company_name = 'ABC Energy Ltd';
UPDATE energy_supplier SET phone_number = '+1-123-456-7890', contact_email = 'info@energyprovider.com' WHERE id = 10;

UPDATE energy_consumption SET energy_usage = 150.75 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE supply_chain_optimization SET optimization_result = 'Improved Efficiency' WHERE optimization_strategy = 'Cost Reduction';
